descriptionModule.briefSummary: This non-randomized pilot study program is focused on assessing the technical characteristics of the Aspire2B mobile device application.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Aspire2B is a mobile wellness app that uses non-invasive measurements to predict various physiological states and estimate biological age. Users are then enrolled in nutrition, fitness, or sleep challenges within the app that are aimed at improving overall wellness and thus helping to reduce biological age. Mobile health (mHealth) interventions require numerous decisions that integrate behavioral theory, user feedback, and technical and practical feasibility considerations. The main purpose of this research program is to test if the application works as intended. This pilot study program is managed internally by Pepsico clinical researchers.

interventions.name: Nutrition
interventions.description: Interact with mobile app and work toward personalized nutrition goals

interventions.name: Fitness
interventions.description: Interact with mobile app and work toward personalized fitness goals

interventions.name: Sleep
interventions.description: Interact with mobile app and work toward personalized sleep goals

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Connection
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to connect wearable devices

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Face scan age
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to conduct face scan to provide biological age

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Face scan stress
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to conduct face scan to provide stress index

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Face scan heart rate
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to conduct face scan to provide heart rate

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Onboarding
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Onboarding sequence

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Goal selection
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to enter own goal

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Goal progress
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Ability to track and measure goal progress (e.g., steps from a wearable device)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Points assigned
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Do points earned reflect what was completed in the app?

primaryOutcomes.measure: Assess the technical characteristics of the app (App proficiency) -Wellness scoring
primaryOutcomes.description: Does the app work as intended: Does wellness score change with lifestyle changes as intended?

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Learnings to inform future versions of the app -Retention
secondaryOutcomes.description: Exploratory analyses of the data aimed to help to inform clinical trial retention rates

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Learnings to Inform future versions of the app -Overall engagement
secondaryOutcomes.description: Exploratory analyses of the data aimed to help to inform predictors of engagement

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Learnings to inform changes to future versions of the app -Specific engagement
secondaryOutcomes.description: Exploratory analyses of the data aimed at informing engagement with specific app features

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Learnings to inform changes to future versions of the app - Dietary behaviors
secondaryOutcomes.description: Exploratory analyses of the data aimed at informing improvements in self-reported diet behaviors

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Learnings to inform changes to future versions of the app -Lifestyle behaviors
secondaryOutcomes.description: Exploratory analyses of the data aimed at informing improvements in self-reported lifestyle behaviors

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Fluent in reading and understanding English or Spanish
* Smartphone users

Exclusion Criteria:

* Cannot proceed to onboarding without downloading the app, consenting to participate, and agreeing to app Terms of Use

locations.facility: Remote, no facility visits. Managed by PepsiCo R&D Life Sciences
